name: dipstick
content:
dipstick noun [C]
(MEASURE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a long, thin stick for measuring the amount of liquid in a container, especially the oil in a car engine
Winai_Tepsuttinun/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages

(PERSON)
slang a silly person
